navTooltip.paper2figure: Generate research figures from papers, including model architecture diagrams, technical roadmaps, and experimental data charts in editable PPTX format
navTooltip.paper2drawio: Convert images to editable DrawIO diagrams, supporting flowcharts, architecture diagrams, and more
navTooltip.paper2ppt: Upload paper PDFs or enter topics, AI intelligently analyzes content and generates beautiful academic presentation slides
navTooltip.pdf2ppt: Quickly convert any PDF document to editable PPTX format while preserving original layout and content structure
navTooltip.image2ppt: Upload images or screenshots, automatically recognize content and convert to editable PPT
navTooltip.image2drawio: Upload any image and convert it to an editable DrawIO diagram
navTooltip.ppt2polish: AI-powered PPT polishing to optimize layout, beautify design, and refine content
navTooltip.knowledge: Manage and search your document knowledge base with intelligent Q&A capabilities
navTooltip.files: View and manage all files generated by workflows, with download and delete operations
